entry.title: dotnet/sdk - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-12-20
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • DOTNET PUBLISH doesn't add tags on docker container when using an environment variable that contains multiple tags #37610
  • ImplicitUsings adds usings for both WPF and WinForms if UseWindowsForms is enabled in a WPF project #37608
  • Containers: extend environment variables for passing registry credentials #37606
  • Remote iOS builds fail as the `dotnet publish` command doesn't find where Mono is installed on target #37605

PullRequests

Created

  • Base version #37625
    untriaged, Area-Workloads
  • Swap 9.0 to current target framework #37609
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged

Merged

  • Permit setting whether to use workload sets or loose manifests Fixes #34561 #37346
    untriaged, Area-Workloads
  • Pass SelfContained=true in CheckIlcVersions #37474
    untriaged, Area-ILLink

Updated

  • Workload history 3 #36809
    untriaged, Area-Workloads
